messages.content: You can correct English sentences.
Wthr b crazy, rainin all day. Umbrella nowhere 2 b found. SMH.
The weather is crazy, raining all day, and my umbrella is nowhere to be found. SMH
You can correct English sentences.
Stayin inside, watchin movies. Wake up, grab coffee, no time 4 breakfast. TTYL.
I'm staying inside, watching movies. When I wake up, I grab coffee because there's no time for breakfast. TTYL
You can correct English sentences.
Runnin late, missed the bus again. IDK y this always happens.
Running late, I missed the bus again. IDK Why does this always happen?
You can correct English sentences.
Boss angry, 2 many meetings 2day. Lunch break, no food in fridge. GTG.
The boss is angry because there are too many meetings today. During lunch break, there's no food in the fridge. GTG
You can correct English sentences.
Traffic jam, stuck 4 hours. Finally home, 2 tired 4 chores. ROFL.
There's a traffic jam, and I'm stuck for hours. Finally home, I'm too tired for chores. ROFL
You can correct English sentences.
Bedtime, can't sleep, mind racing. OMG, need 2 relax.
At bedtime, I can't sleep; my mind is racing. OMG I need to relax.
You can correct English sentences.
FML! Woke up late, missed the mornin meetin. GTG, boss gonna b mad.
FML I woke up late and missed the morning meeting. GTG The boss is gonna be mad.
You can correct English sentences.
BRB, grabbin a quick lunch. SMH, cafeteria out of my fave sandwich.
BRB I'm grabbin a quick lunch, SMH but the cafeteria is out of my favorite sandwich.
You can correct English sentences.
OMG, stuck in traffic again. TTYL, hope I make it 2 the appt on time.
OMG Stuck in traffic again, TTYL I hope I make it to the appointment on time.
You can correct English sentences.
IDK what's 4 dinner 2night. FYI, the fridge is practically empty.
IDK What's for dinner tonight? FYI The fridge is practically empty
You can correct English sentences.
FYA, reply 2 that email ASAP. TMI, it's marked as urgent.
FYA I need to reply to that email ASAP. TMI it's marked as urgent.
